Sentencas: High energy efficiency and energy density, together with rapid refuelling capability, render fuel cells highly attractive for portable power generation(1,2).
Titulo: A thermally self-sustained micro solid-oxide fuel-cell stack with high power density

Sentencas: Accordingly, polymer-electrolyte direct-methanol fuel cells are of increasing interest as possible alternatives to Li ion batteries(3).
Titulo: A thermally self-sustained micro solid-oxide fuel-cell stack with high power density

Sentencas: However, such fuel cells face several design challenges and cannot operate with hydrocarbon fuels of higher energy density.
Titulo: A thermally self-sustained micro solid-oxide fuel-cell stack with high power density

Sentencas: Solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) enable direct use of higher hydrocarbons(4-6), but have not been seriously considered for portable applications because of thermal management difficulties at small scales, slow start-up and poor thermal cyclability.
Titulo: A thermally self-sustained micro solid-oxide fuel-cell stack with high power density

Sentencas: Here we demonstrate a thermally self-sustaining micro-SOFC stack with high power output and rapid start-up by using single chamber operation on propane fuel.
Titulo: A thermally self-sustained micro solid-oxide fuel-cell stack with high power density

Sentencas: The catalytic oxidation reactions supply sufficient thermal energy to maintain the fuel cells at 500 - 600 degrees C. A power output of similar to 350 mW( at 1.0 V) was obtained from a device with a total cathode area of only 1.42 cm(2).
Titulo: A thermally self-sustained micro solid-oxide fuel-cell stack with high power density
